General.Name: Pebblebrook Hotel Trust
General.Description: Pebblebrook Hotel Trust (NYSE: PEB) is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) and the largest owner of urban and resort lifestyle hotels in the United States. The Company owns 53 hotels, totaling approximately 13,200 guestrooms across 14 urban and resort markets, with a focus on the west coast gateway cities.
General.Address: 4747 Bethesda Avenue, Bethesda, MD, United States, 20814
